manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Heritage A young entrepreneur and a revolutionary scientist, Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan, planted the seeds of 'Kurtsan'​ at a compact pharmacy in Istanbul, 65 years ago with the vision of healing people through the power of nature. At a time when 'herbal medicines'​ and 'natural living'​ were just a dream to many, Ph. Niyazi Kurtsan developed pharmaceuticals, remedies and cosmetics from the miraculous plants of Anatolia, Turkey. Since 1955, Otaci has been an accomplished brand in the natural skincare, cosmetics and pharmaceutical industries. We have significantly contributed to these industries through vigorous and innovative Research and Development with the core objective of utilizing nature to make lives better for the humankind. Otaci aims to protect human health through the healing power of nature. Our vision is to be a global brand that heals people with high-quality herbal products inspired by nature. Otaci is the reliable, premium, local and the most honest natural and herbal alternative to the daily ritual of all personal care & cosmetics. The hills of Isparta in the Mediterranean are surrounded by a cloud of excitement in May. With the sunrise, farmers make their way to rose gardens of Isparta. They handpick every single one of the petals of the most delicate and valuable flowers, Mediterranean Rose, “Rosa damascena”. Our delicate roses are rushed to our pharmaceutical factory to create Otaci Rose Passion with the most valuable oils & extracts of the Mediterranean Rose, “Rosa damascena”. Rosa damascena forms a herbalist's floral ritual to purify, revive and hydrate the face and body. Made from this Mediterranean Rose, a miracle treatment that is indigenous to the city of Isparta, Otaci's skin products naturally promote beauty through formulas that optimize cellular moisture, firmness, nourishment and softness.

Natural and Vegan Skin Care Since 1955 Otaci Rose Passion 100% Natural Rose Water Hydrating Face Mist, Spray Rosewater Face Mist Facial Hydrating Natural Skin Otaci Rose Passion 100% Natural Rose Water Hydrating Face Mist, Spray Rosewater Face Mist Facial Hydrating Natural Skin is packed with a refreshing burst of rosewater and natural ingredients. Give your skin the hydration it deserves with the all-natural Rose Water Hydrating Face Mist. Our facial mist is the perfect pre- or post-makeup refresher and contains high concentrations of 100% pure rose water to gently soothe and hydrate your skin. OTACI Rose Passion 100% Natural Rose Water Hydrating Toner, Facial Skin Moisturizer Hydrating Natural Cleanser Concentrated and powerful, discover the power of 100% natural Mediterranean rose water toner in our original Rose Passion formula! Our hydrating toner helps to balance PH levels, acne and even redness. This is a fresh & light facial toner that refreshes and hydrates skin as it cleanses. OTACI Rose Passion Deep Hydration Face Cream Otaci Deep Hydration Face Cream is the ultimate solution for dry skin. This rich, non-greasy & gentle cream is the perfect blend of natural ingredients, including 100% pure Mediterranean rose water, pure olive oil and shea butter. OTACI Rose Passion Deep Hydration Face Cream uses only the purest, organic and natural ingredients and has a clean, cruelty-free label.

OTACI Rose Passion Brow and Lash Serum, Lash Growth Eyelash Growth Natural Want to have natural-looking brows and lashes? THE PERFECT SOLUTION IS the OTACI Rose Passion Brow and Lash Serum, Lash Growth Eyelash Growth Natural. This vegan, dermatologist-tested, cruelty-free formula contains natural ingredients that promote eyelash and eyebrow growth. With this natural serum, you'll have the perfect eyebrows & lashes you've always wanted. OTACI Rose Passion Micellar Cleansing Water, Face Cleansing Makeup Skin Remover Wash Rosewater Hydrating Moisturizer OTACI Micellar Cleansing Water deeply and quickly removes all traces of makeup, dirt, oil, and impurities in seconds and through the use of gentle natural oils. It is not just a skin cleanser but also a refreshing toner with a light weight non-greasy formula that leaves your skin feeling refreshed, soft and smooth. OTACI Rose Passion Facial Cleansing Foam, Face Cleanser Wash Foam Skin Facial Water Rose Foaming Natural Say goodbye to dry, red, irritated skin! Our facial cleansing foam is gentle enough for everyday use and contains 100 % natural Rose oil and Rosewater. When it comes to cleansing, OTACI Rose Passion Facial Cleansing Foam is the most luxurious and effective way to remove excess oils, dirt, and makeup. It's dermatologist tested and so gentle you can use it every day. The refreshing fragrance of Rose oil will leave your skin feeling soft and hydrated.

Apply post make-up removal ritual as tonic to firm up your face and neck. Keep your skin fresh and hydrated with Otacı Rose Ritual 100% Natural Rose Water Hydrating Face Mist. Ideal for a finishing touch. Natural Mediterranean Rose Water Extracts will purify, nourish and moisturize your skin Developed in foam form for sensitive skin, it gently removes make-up, purifies the skin and moisturizes the face with delicate Rose Extracts and Aloe Vera. Promotes eyelash & eyebrow growth and strength with Rose Water, Yarrow and Provitamin B5. Nourishes your face and neck with delicate and unique rose oil in the morning and at night. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this toner. It’s gentle enough to where I’m not stripping my face or aggravating my skin. Some toners will burn if I’ve washed my face too much, but not this one. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have super reactive skin, and this is perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I keep this in the fridge, and use it both as a toner in the morning, and as a refresher in the afternoon. It's lightly scented, as it should be, and I've never had anyone notice the scent. But I do, and it's lovely.I have super reactive skin, I blister, develop hives, and/or get contact burns from most toners. This is perfect, soothing, and it balances skin ph, so my skin is calmer longer.Great product, I'm a fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good toner that is soothing.
reviews.reviewText: I use rose water as a toner after cleansing. It is very soothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ocati Rose Passion Toner
reviews.reviewText: I am enjoying this toner, it's light and has a pleasant fragrance, very subtle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So pleased this rose water does what it is supposed to do for your skin. Not only a good moisturizer but it smells heavenly & very natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best rose water
reviews.reviewText: I have tried and tested several brands of rose water, this one is by far the best, and genuine
